basics.name: Alexander Common - WORK IN PROGRESS
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: An information technology professional with 14 years experience. Specializing in process improvement, documentation, requirement gathering & analysis, and automation.

work.name: GM / Onstar
work.summary: Primary responsibilities include upgrading and maintaining the OnStar billing systems. Also, researching potential improvements, creating and maintaining documentation, and corporate compliance. Worked in a close-knit team oriented environment. Delivering objects under tight deadlines in fast-paced, client-oriented environment
highlights: Designed an implemented HTML invoice templates for middle-east
Converted old MS Word invoices into HTML & Liquid
Co-implemented tax reporting workflow for Mexico

work.name: Computer Science Corporation
work.summary: Primary responsibilities include upgrading and maintaining the Solumina manufacturing execution system
highlights: Implemented an automated patching script, freeing developers from making SQL patches manually.
Solved a number of problems previously thought unsolvable. Including methods to change user input screens on-the-fly, overcoming out-of-the-box limitations.
Discovered, implemented and maintained solution to display webpages within manufacturing program.

volunteer.summary: Interact with visitors, answer any questions about the shelter and adoption, and ensure cats & visitors get along. Clean up and open if necessary. Occationally visitor check-in and cash register.
